Selection.name: Selection
Selection.description: A class extension for DataTable that adds "highlight" and "select" actions via mouse selection.
Selection.author: Todd Smith

Y.DataTable.Selection.name: Y.DataTable.Selection
Y.DataTable.Selection.description: A class extension for DataTable that adds "highlight" and "select" actions via mouse selection.

classitems.description: Attribute that is set to a Node for the most recent "highlighted" item, either TD or TR
classitems.name: highlighted

classitems.description: Attribute that is set to a Node for the most recent "selected" item, either TD or TR
classitems.name: selected

classitems.description:
Set the current mode for highlighting, either for a single TD (as "cell") or for a
full TR (as "row"
classitems.name: highlightMode

classitems.description:
Set the current mode for indicating selections, either for a single TD (as "cell") or for a
full TR (as "row"
classitems.name: highlightMode

classitems.description: Readonly attribute which returns the currently selected TR's
classitems.name: selectedRows

classitems.description:
Attribute that either sets the current "selected" records (by entering an array of DataTable record
indices) or returns an array of "selected" records based on the recent selections.
classitems.name: selectedRecords

classitems.description: Attribute that sets the initially selected cells TD's or returns the currently selected TD's.
classitems.name: selectedCells

classitems.description:
Flag to allow either single "selections" (false) or multiple selections (true).
For Macintosh OSX-type systems the modifier key "Cmd" is held for multiple selections,
 and for Windows or Linux type systems the modifier key is "Ctrl".
classitems.name: selectionMulti

classitems.description: Holder for the classname for the "highlight" TR or TD
classitems.name: _classHighlight

classitems.description: Holder for the classname for the "selected" TR or TD
classitems.name: _classSelected

classitems.description:
Holder for the most recent "click" event modifier keys from last click,
 used for assessing "multi" selections.

Contains properties;  altKey, ctrlKey, shiftKey, metaKey, button and which

Filled initially by .initializer and on each Table "click".
classitems.name: _clickModifiers

classitems.description: Sets listeners and initial class names required for this "datatable-selector" module
classitems.name: initializer

classitems.description: Destructor to clean up listener event handlers and the internal storage buffer.
classitems.name: destructor

classitems.description: Returns the Column object (from the original "columns") associated with the input TD Node.
classitems.name: getColumnByTd

params.name: cell
params.description: Node of TD for which column object is desired

return.description: column The column object entry associated with the desired cell

classitems.description: Returns the column "key" or "name" string for the requested TD Node
classitems.name: getColumnNameByTd

params.name: cell
params.description: Node of TD for which column name is desired

return.description: colName Column name or key name

classitems.description:
Utility method that will return all selected TD Nodes for the current "selected" set.
If selections include a TR row, all child TD's from the row are included.
classitems.name: getSelectedTds

return.description: tds Array of selected TD's as Nodes

classitems.description: Method that updates the "highlighted" classes for the selection and unhighlights the prevVal
classitems.name: _highlightChange

classitems.description:
Method that updates the "selected" classes for the selection and un-selects the prevVal.
This method works with multiple selections (via ATTR `selectionMulti` true) by pushing
the current selection to the this._selections property.
classitems.name: _selectedChange

props.name: ochange
props.description: Change event object passed from attribute 'selected'

props.name: record
props.description: DataTable record (Y.Model) instance for the selection

classitems.description: Returns the current "raw" settings of selections (includes multiple selections)
classitems.name: _getSelected

return.description: selections Array of selected TR's and/or TD's

classitems.description:
Getter method that returns an Array of the selected cells in {record,column} coordinate format.
If rows or TR elements were selected, it adds all of the row's child TD's.
classitems.name: _getSelectedCells

return.description: cells The selected cells in {record:, column:} format

params.name: cells.record
params.description: Record for this cell as a Y.Model

params.name: cells.column
params.description: Column for this cell defined in original "columns" DataTable attribute

classitems.description:
Setter method for attribute `selectedCells` that takes an array of cells as input and sets them
as the current selected set with appropriate visual class.
classitems.name: _setSelectedCells

params.name: val
params.description: The desired cells to set as selected, in {record:,column:} format

props.name: record
props.description: Record for this cell as either record index or record clientId

props.name: column
props.description: Column for this cell as either the column index or "key" or "name"

classitems.description:
A setter method for attribute `selectedRecords` that takes as input an array of desired DataTable
record indices to be "selected", clears existing selections and sets the "selected" records and
highlights the TR's
classitems.name: _setSelectedRecords

params.name: val
params.description: recIndices Array of record indices desired to be set as selected.

return.description: records Array of DataTable records (Y.Model) for each selection chosen

classitems.description:
A getter method for the `selectedRecords` attribute that returns an array of DataTable records (Y.Model)
 based on the current "selected" items, either TR's or TD's.

 If TD's were selected it converts them to their base record.
classitems.name: _getSelectedRecords

return.description: records Array of records from the DataTable based on the selected items

classitems.description:
Method used to derive from the clicked selection, either the TR or TD of the selection, and
returns the current `selectionMode` or `highlightMode` Node (based on the setting of prefix).

This method adds the required class, and if erasePrev is true, removes the class from the prior setting.
classitems.name: _processNodeAction

return.description: node Returned target Y.Node, either TR or TD based upon current `selectionMode` or `highlightMode`

classitems.description: Method removes the specified `type` class from all nodes within the TBODY data node.
classitems.name: _clearAll

params.name: type
params.description: Class name to remove from all nodes attached to TBODY DATA

classitems.description:
Setter for `highlightMode` attribute, removes prior event handle (if exists) and defines
a new delegated "mouseover" handler that updates the `highlighted` attribute.

A change to this setting clears all prior highlighting.
classitems.name: _setHighlightMode

classitems.description:
Setter for `selectionMode` attribute, removes prior event handle (if exists) and defines
a new delegated "click" handler that updates the `selected` attribute.

A change to this setting clears all prior selections.
classitems.name: _setSelectionMode
